Name: Ballet Russe
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with lime wedge on rim.
Review: Intense sweet blackcurrant balanced by lime sourness.
Nutrition: One serving of Ballet Russe contains 224 calories
